# PortalComponent.CrossingMode.plane(_:)

**Case**

Allows contents within the portal to cross out of the portal along the provided plane.

## Declaration

```swift
case plane(PortalComponent.Plane)
```
title: PortalComponent.CrossingMode.plane(_:)
